name: Prime Holding JSC
description:
Prime Holding JSC is a holding company of several premium software development companies based in South-East Europe. Prime has over 20 years of experience and more than 500 completed projects for clients from the USA, Europe, and Asia.
 
The company employs over 250 software engineers with vast expertise in different technologies, such as Java, .NET, JS technologies and many more.
We are passionate about technology and really good at solving problems. We develop long-term partnerships with our customers and always go the extra mile to deliver success.  
We provide software development and consulting services that can help our partners overcome various business challenges and get a step ahead of the competition. 
 
Some focus domains: Fintech/Blockchain, Network monitoring, Salesforce, HR software solutions, Custom enterprise development, Web and Mobile.
